title: Required Shots for School and Children's Facilities
description: Immunizations required for age 2 months and starting pre-Kindergarten through 12th grade and college
sitename: Required Shots for School and Children's Facilities : Oregon Health Authority
cleaned_text: born on or after January 1, 1957 needs to show that they've been vaccinated against measles when enrolling in a college or university as a full-time student (undergraduate and graduate). Requirements for part-time students vary by institution. Community Colleges Students participating in practicum experiences in allied health, education, early childhood education and intercollegiate sports are required to meet measles immunization requirements in community colleges. NOTE: Colleges can require that full or part-time students have additional vaccinations. Check with the college about any additional requirements.
